name: UKCoreCareSettingType
title: UK Core Care Setting Type
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a correspondence care setting type. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Correspondence Care setting type' subset with subset original id 43971000000130; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Correspondence care setting type simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000381000000107
